Quickstrike:




Quickstrike kept walking. He passed the confindment area where he heard 
Rattrap was locked up. He didn't bother to go by the door, he just went on, 
exploring the rooms of the ship. He had tried locked doors and poked his 
head in half opened ones to see what was in them. He had seen a room full of 
weapons and heavy guns. It must have been the artilery room. He knew where 
the control room was, and didn't dare to go there again. Two--three fights 
today was enough.

As he began to pass a room that looked like it was the bridge. He had been 
here once. He saw a gather of bots there, one was Megatron. He quickly swung 
out of sight before any of them saw him. The majority of them were against 
him. He stood beside the frame of the door and listened to them. Perhaps now 
was a good time he could talk to Megatron about his plan.

He kicked the corridor wall with his metal heel a few times to get his 
attention. Then he tried his best to disguise his deep voice, not wanting to 
catch the others. He called his name.

>::: Hell Beast ::: Ah, Rampage, you can take Inferno and Tankkor and repair
>some of the Auto-guns. I have to go meet with Liono Prime...
>
>::: He gets up and departs from the base and lands within sight range of
>Liono Prme :::
>
>::: Hell Beast ::: Liono Prime, I am not armed and I am ready to talk.
>
>~~~~~~~~~~~~
>
>::: Gremlin, Marine, Black Aracnia, Pheniox, Jackle, and Megatron all wait
>within the Predacon ship, armed and rearing to fight. They maintain the
>computers and keep vigil. :::
